Text: Think you could re-rip using EAC or XLD so that we can get a cue sheet (for proper pregaps)?

This doesn't sound lossless to my ears; it sounds compressed. Albums with a lot of acoustic sounds, such as this one, typically are more difficult to compress in a lossless fashion, so I would have predicted the FLAC version to be close in size to the raw album. Only time will tell...
